text: "We Weren't Born to Follow" is a 2009 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and taken from their 11th studio album The Circle. It was nominated for a Grammy Award. It peaked at number 68 in the United States and number 25 in the United Kingdom. The highest position was number 3 in Japan. ==Track listing== == References == Category:2009 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: We Weren't Born to Follow
